message.content:
From the relationships, we can piece together the following chain:

• Christina is an ancestor of Nicholas.
• Nicholas is an ancestor of Michelle.
• Michelle is an ancestor of Gregory (since Gregory is Michelle’s descendant).
• Gregory is an ancestor of Amber (since Amber is Gregory’s descendant).

This chain gives us: Christina → Nicholas → Michelle → Gregory → Amber.

Further, we have:
• Christina is a descendant of Anna (so Anna is an ancestor of Christina).
• Richard is an ancestor of Anna.
• Richard is a descendant of Mary (so Mary is an ancestor of Richard).

This gives us a chain: Mary → Richard → Anna → Christina.

Now combining the two chains:
Mary → Richard → Anna → Christina → Nicholas → Michelle → Gregory → Amber.

Thus, Amber is a descendant of Mary.

<ANSWER>4</ANSWER>
